original_text: Payment Request and Reminder MechanismsZelle offers a "split the bill" feature, either within its standalone application (until its planned discontinuation) or through the integrated banking apps of participating institutions, enabling users to easily divide expenses among multiple recipients.89 The platform provides options for users to send and request money using the recipient's email address or phone number, simplifying the payment process.36 Zelle also offers transaction alerts to keep users informed about sent and received payments, as well as payment requests.97 Furthermore, some banks that offer Zelle integration also provide the option to set up recurring payments, facilitating scheduled transfers for regular expenses.100 Zelle's provision of bill splitting and payment request functionalities, similar to Venmo and Cash App, indicates that these are essential features for a competitive P2P payment application.

original_text: Common user complaints regarding Venmo include concerns about privacy due to the default public nature of transactions 26, instances of unexpected account freezing 30, and difficulties in reaching responsive and helpful customer service.30Cash App users have reported issues such as unexpected fund holds 121, experiences with rude and unhelpful customer service interactions 125, and significant security concerns related to scams, hacking incidents, and unauthorized access leading to financial losses.121To create a superior product, the new application must prioritize robust security measures, including strong encryption protocols, two-factor authentication for enhanced account protection, and proactive fraud monitoring systems.3 Implementing clear and granular privacy settings with private defaults for all transactions and user data will be essential to address user concerns about oversharing.24 Furthermore, providing responsive and helpful customer support through multiple channels, such as 24/7 availability via chat, email, and phone, with clear escalation paths for resolving issues, will be crucial for building user trust and satisfaction.16
